'''18w10d''' is the twenty-seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on March 9, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w10a|March 6, 2018}}</ref>, which added [[coral reef]]s and more [[waterlogged]] blocks.

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''{{EnvLink|Coral reef|text=Coral reefs}}'''
* Generate in warm ocean [[biome]]s.
* Are composed of [[coral block]]s and [[coral]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Shulker box]]es'''
* Can now be undyed using a [[cauldron]].
** The water level in the cauldron decreases by 1.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Phantom]]s'''
* Now burn in sunlight and no longer despawn during daytime.

'''[[Baby zombie]]s'''
* Now burn in sunlight.

=== General ===
'''[[Waterlogging]]'''
* [[Water]] physics.
** Water can now be placed in [[ender chest]]s, [[trapdoor]]s, [[ladder]]s, and [[sign]]s.
** Water no longer goes through solid faces.

'''Optimizations'''
* Optimized how clouds are rendered.
